name: Super Picture Cross
description:
A casual and stimulating nonogram puzzle game with endless logic puzzles to solve. Uncover a huge variety of 3D objects, and discover new puzzles - never run out of fun thanks to the amazing Anything World technology!

CHILL NONOGRAM PUZZLING

ENDLESS PUZZLING - SEARCH FOR WHATEVER YOU WANT

FEATURES

  • 20 curated levels
  • Search for anything you can think of, the game generates puzzles for it
  • Collection mode to view your discoveries
  • Replay to beat your best time on any puzzle
  • 13 Achievements
  • How to play mode to teach you the basics
